channel.title: Comments on: I lose my war machine to this all the time
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: Ozone_25
item.dc:creator: Ozone_25
item.description: War machine should not count towards nukes and everyone would be happy
item.content:encoded: War machine should not count towards nukes and everyone would be happy

item.title: By: Visible_Item_9915
item.dc:creator: Visible_Item_9915
item.description: Thankfully so. Everything should have a counter. It could only block 4.
item.content:encoded: Thankfully so. Everything should have a counter. It could only block 4.

item.title: By: Landlord_Rights
item.dc:creator: Landlord_Rights
item.description: Good, this killstreak is the worst in the game.
item.content:encoded: Good, this killstreak is the worst in the game.

item.title: By: Breezii2z
item.dc:creator: Breezii2z
item.description: Off topic but Treyarch ruined S&D with Marshalls
item.content:encoded: Off topic but Treyarch ruined S&D with Marshalls

item.title: By: Opathoris
item.dc:creator: Opathoris
item.description: Trophy systems need to be nerfed. Increase the time to generate by double. Some games the entire field is littered with the things.
item.content:encoded: Trophy systems need to be nerfed. Increase the time to generate by double. Some games the entire field is littered with the things.

item.title: By: Yellowtoblerone
item.dc:creator: Yellowtoblerone
item.description: holy shit switch back to your primary and shoot the trophy
item.content:encoded: holy shit switch back to your primary and shoot the trophy

item.title: By: Wombizzle
item.dc:creator: Wombizzle
item.description: Blows my mind how OP the war machine is. It literally does not matter if you have flak jacket, it basically launches Suns at you
item.content:encoded: Blows my mind how OP the war machine is. It literally does not matter if you have flak jacket, it basically launches Suns at you

item.title: By: BraveT0ast3r
item.dc:creator: BraveT0ast3r
item.description: Run engineer. There’s always a counter.
